item.title: Article 1: Data Leakage
item.description: What is Data Leakge? Data leakage refers to a problem where information about the holdout datasets, such as test or validation datasets, is made available to the model in the training dataset. This leakage is often small but can have an adverse effect on the model’s performance To simplify this, we can also say that when the information of test data is passed into the train data and our model knows about the test data while training.

item.title: Project 1: Spam Mail Detector
item.description: Created a tool that detect spam mails becuase spam has been a major problem in day-to-day lifes of a customer. Naive Bayes classifier algorithm has been used on the context classification of each email, with a strong assumption that the words included in the email are independent of each other. Built a client facing API using Flask. Link to GitHub Repository
